object.label: Save Project As...

object.name: ID_ITEM_CLOSE
object.label: $Close File\tCtrl+F4
object.help: Close the editor for this item.

object.name: wxID_EXIT
object.label: E$xit
object.help: Quit the application; prompts to save the project if changed.

object.name: wxID_CUT
object.label: Cu$t\tCtrl+X

object.name: ID_EDIT_SELECTALL
object.label: Select $All\tCtrl+A
object.help: Select all text in the documnet

object.name: ID_EDIT_GOTOLINE
object.label: $Goto line\tCtrl+G
object.help: Go to a specific line in the file.

object.name: ID_MARKER_SET
object.label: Set/Clear bookmark\tCtrl-F2
object.help: Set/clear marker on the current line.

object.help: Add an existing item of this type
